attributes.action: Issue urgent advice to the parents of Clinically Extremely Vunerable children
attributes.additional_details:
I am the mother of an CEV 8.5 year old and we have been completely dumped for advice now that the CEV adults have been vaccinated. 
When will the CEV Children get the vaccines that their GPS are saying they will authorise but not without JCVI and NHS England guidelines? This needs to be answered urgently! 

We no longer get the sheilding advice letters and are left to play Russian Roulette every day or lock down our family and isolate whilst everyone else " learns to live with Covid 19".
attributes.background:
Please issue advice urgently on how CEV children under 16 should learn to live with Covid 19? 
When will the vaccine be approved for them as it is not being given unlicensed as suggested by the PM or on the Green Paper. 
MPs to stop telling the press that "All Vunerable people are now vaccinated".
